contents:

title: Demo Card 3: Unicode
contents:
Искате да зададете въпроса си на български? Няма проблем. Qt поддържа Unicode!

Колко е 2+2

title: Demo Card 4: Markdown
contents:
Questions in FlashKarti support Markdown syntax: 

### What will be the output of the code below? Explain your answer.
```
def extendList(val, list=[]):
    list.append(val)
    return list

list1 = extendList(10)
list2 = extendList(123, [])
list3 = extendList('a')

print(list1, list2, list3)
```

title: Demo Card 5: Markdown
contents:
An example quiz card with Markdown

### This is an unordered list
- item 1
- item 2
- item 3

### This is an ordered list
1. item 1
2. item 2
3. item 3

title: Demo Card 6: Markdown
contents:
